Worcester.Gilman Block: The Gilman Block was a historic commercial building at 207-219 Main Street in Worcester, Massachusetts. It was a four-story brick building, with Classical Revival and Romanesque/Tuscan Mediterranean influence, built in 1896 to a design by the local architectural firm of Cutting, Carleton & Cutting. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2000, at which time it stood alone on its block, the surrounding buildings having been demolished by urban renewal activities.
